title: Smart Data Models - GovGAST4
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Generic turbogas.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovGAST4

bp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Droop (bp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

ktm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Compressor gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

mnef.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel flow maximum negative error value (MN).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0

mxef.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel flow maximum positive error value (MX).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

rymn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum valve opening (RYMN).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

rymx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve opening (RYMX).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening velocity (T).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate closing velocity (T).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

tcm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel control time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

tm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Compressor discharge volume time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

tv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of fuel valve positioner (T).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0
